description: From Ancient Greek βάτραχος (bátrakhos, “frog”) and τοξίνη (toxínē, “poison”).

entries.meaning: (neurotoxicology, uncountable) An extremely neurotoxic and cardiotoxic steroidal alkaloid found in poison dart frogs.
(toxicology, countable) Any one of a group of extremely neurotoxic and cardiotoxic steroidal alkaloids found in poison dart frogs, Melyridae beetles, and certain birds.
